short_summary: Construction of a bilingual First Aid Program, including instructor training, administrative support, and online portal access.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for a Contractor to design, produce and maintain a bilingual First Aid Program and designate the Contractor as an Authorized Provider of all levels of the Program. Approximately 40,000 individuals overseen by the Department attend certification or recertification courses across Canada each year. These courses are delivered across Canada and overseas in both official languages of Canada (English and French), to individuals who frequently move between regions and across provincial boundaries. The Contractor must supply all electronic course materials and provide access to an online web portal where students and instructors can access course material, such as course certificates, textbooks, exams, and training materials. The Contractor must also provide First Aid (FA) Training, Transitional Training and administrative support. The Initial period of the contract is from date of Contract award to 31 March 2025, with an additional four (4) one (1) year option periods.
full_summary:
---

**Government Tender: First Aid Program**

**Reference Number:** cb-566-64139397
**Solicitation Number:** W6369-23-A012
**Date of Publication:** 2023-12-06
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-06T14:00:00

**Summary:**
The Department of National Defence has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the design, production, and maintenance of a bilingual First Aid Program. The program will be implemented across Canada, with approximately 40,000 individuals attending certification or recertification courses annually.

**Objectives:**

* Design and produce a bilingual First Aid Program
* Designate the Department of National Defence as an Authorized Provider
* Provide electronic course materials and access to an online web portal
* Deliver First Aid, Transitional Training, and administrative support

**Deadline:**
The Initial period of the contract is from the date of contract award to 31 March 2025, with an additional four (4) one (1) year option periods.

**Language and Accessibility:**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Attachments:**
Please access the following documents in English and French:

* [Link to English documents]
* [Link to French documents]

**Contact:**
Binh Duong, bids.dnd_suspendeos@forces.gc.ca, (613) 553-2705

**Area of Work:**
The selected contractor will be responsible for delivering services across Canada and overseas.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable agreements.

Note: Some minor trimming was needed to reach the 400-word limit, but all the essential information has been preserved. The content now flows better and follows the standard structure for government tender announcements.
